attributes.action: put it to the appropriate official that passports should no longer be required for travel within the European Union
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Since we are in a union with a number of European countries it seems to me that the requirement to have a passport to travel to these countries is something of an anomaly.  If this was changed it would increase tourism to both the U.K. and the other countries of the E.U. which can only benefit the economies of all E.U. countries.  

Either we are in a union with them or we're not; this would be one way of proving that we are.  It might also help to reconcile anti-Europeans to the existence of the E.U. which I believe has helped to avoid wars in Europe.
